Module jBomberman
Package model

Class Account

java.lang.Object
model.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Account>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccountConcrete, DecoratorAccount
public abstract class Account extends Object implements Comparable<Account>, Serializable
This class contains all the information related to an account created by the user. Objects of this type are serialized because serialization allows saving or importing operations by the user.
See Also:

    • Account

      public Account(String nickname, long identifier)
      Constructor used only by the developer to show testing accounts.
      Parameters:
      nickname - name chosen for the account by the user
      identifier - forced birthday ID
